auth.owner: owner of the bot's discord ID

prefix: whatever you'd like to prefix (include a space)

a guild id to moderate.home: discord channel ID to post moderation messages to
a guild id to moderate.ourname: a string for whatever you wanna refer to it as (never used, only for your notes)

searchChannels: channel IDs allowed to use the booru search

exemptions: discord user IDs to not moderate
banned: words that should get a user banned
warned: words that should send an alert to the reporting channel
false: words or phrases that are false positives for the warning system

twitchMod.reporting: discord channel ID to report to
bannedPhrases: phrases to ban in twitch chat
timeoutPhrases: phrases to timeout in twitch chat
